title: Makrovita
description: Macrobiotic center and shop on the ground floor of apartment block in Novo Sarajevo part of city. Sells ecologically produced foods and products: grains, soy foods, natural supplements, face and body care items, household products, and literature. Also cooking class, shiatsu massage, reflexotherapy, counseling.
streetAddress: BBI Center, Trg djece Sarajeva 1, Dr. Fetaha Becirbegovica 31, Čengić Vila
